name: Coronarfour
description:
From Chocorona-Tubes

A game about trying to get what you want from the store when avoiding people having Coronaviruses.

You have to grab what you can from the shop list and go to the cash register to finish the game, and under one minute because the shop is closing. You aslo have to avoid as much as you can the other people to avoid the disease.

Credits:

Quang-Tú SALA : Gameplay Programer, UI Programer

Hugues ROGER : Character Programer, Camera Programer and VFX artist

Chloé ZORZOPIAN : 3D & 2D Artist and Animator

Vincent HOMHANN : Game Designer and Level Designer

Romain GINER : AI Programer and Sound Designer and Composer
